concept.title: Intel Parallel Studio XE - ComposerClusterProfessional edition

conbody.p: IntelÂ® Parallel Studio XE for Linux* OS is a software development product that facilitates native code development on Linux in C++ and Fortran for parallel computing.

The ClusterProfessionalComposer edition includes compilers, performance libraries, and parallel models made to build fast parallel codeall the tools in the Composer and Professional editions plus MPI cluster tools including a standards-based MPI Library, MPI communications profiling and analysis tool, MPI error checking and tuning tools and cluster checkercompilers, performance libraries, and parallel models made to build fast parallel code.
